name: [Parts Not Included]
description:
Parts Not Included is a 3D, ability-based puzzle game where you play as Jammo: a disassembled robot who must find his parts and save the ship. Each part has certain abilities that Jammo can use when it's equipped. Use these abilities to traverse the levels, fight enemies, and solve puzzles!

Credits:

Keegan Grottke: World/Level Designer

Nick Hildebrant - Enemy Programmer

Carlos Encinas Guerrero - Animator and Programmer

Jacob Lyons - U.I. Designer and Programmer

Rob Davis - Systems/Ability Designer and Programmer

Special Thanks to: Al Langit (@toyotacorolla30 on Twitter) for Music Production

Abilities

Each level will introduce a new body part for Jammo to use. You are free to switch between each whenever you please, so find the right combination and solve the level's puzzles! You are also free to disassemble yourself at any time to fit in smaller areas- be wary though, disabling a part means you can't use its ability anymore.

Enemies

Be careful, the other robots on the ship have gone haywire! You can either run or defend yourself from the different types. From the standard Alpha, tanky Bravo, flying Echo, or rolling Kilo, you're free to choose how to deal with these enemies in your own way!

Controls:

WASD- Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Camera

Mouse Click - Use Arm Ability

1 - Drop all equipped parts

2 - Drop Legs

3 - Drop Arms

Tab + 2 - Switch leg ability

Tab + 3 - Switch arm ability

E (while in range of terminal) - Begin Hacking minigame

(While hacking) Arrow Keys - Move Ball

(While hacking) Esc - Exit minigame
